Html:
Hi all,

 

In the demo (Windows Form) I saw this button "Get Static", and I would like to know if there is a way to Load this static picture ?

In fact I would like to draw some stuffs on the map, and then reload it. I think this Get static is the best way to save this drawing, but No button "Load static" exists.  Is there any function to perform in it?

Thanks a lot in advance for any help.

Hi Radioman,

I just wanted to know if we can load on the map some static picture with world file we saved with this "Get Static button" ? If so, how can I do it (is there any examples) ?

Thanks.
